div.p:
Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem quarto
die mensis octobris Anno Dominj et cetera quingentesimo decimo

The said day Waltir cullane bailye grantit that he and patrik chernsid' come
Souerte for the pament of xxj s' scottis money tile alexnader King be thar ob
ligacioun' for lent money quhilkis the bailyeis chargit him to pay withtin
terme of law

The said day the bailyeis chargit Johnne stevin to comper one mononday
befor thame to ansuer at the Instance of Walter Cullan' and patrik chernsid'
for the releving of thame of xxj s' scottis money at the Instance handis
of Alexander King

The said day the bailyeis assignit this day viij dais to the Relict' of
vmquhile Androw stevinsone to ansuer to the bile of ayrschip gevin In
one hir be Androw stratoun' tutour to robert stevinson' son and ayr to the said'
vmquhil androw stevinson' and' ormond' lesly come Souerte for the
said' relict' that scho suld' do it that accordit hir to do of law anent ane
hors clamit be the said' Androw

The said day Dauid' mar lauchfully callit warnit and nocht comperit
til haue ansuerit to the borgh' fundin one him be Androu louson' for
the wranguis' Intrometting and occupeing of ane tennement that is to say
ane barne and yard' liand' in the castelgat Tharfor the bailyeis
chargit Wilyeame scrimgeour officiar to pas' and tak ane stres' of the
said Dauid' and warne him agane mononday cum this day xv dais to ansuer to the
said' borgh' as first day of process'

The said day Dauid alexandersone grantit him awand' v s' of siluer
to Johnne abirdour quhilkis the bailyeis chargit him to pay within terme of
of law And' x s' to be pait in penny or sufficient penny worthtis betuix
this and mertymes nixt tocum

The said day It was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' Johnne colison'
forspekar That the wif of thome coule wricht sal deliuire to Wilyeam'
blinseile coupar ane scheit with ane firlot of malt And' the said Wilyam
to pay for the malt siclik as it was bough'

Curia gilde burgi de Abirdene' tenta In pretorio eiusdem Septimo die
mensis octobris Anno Domini Millesimo quingintesimo decimo

Johannes lesly de Warderis
Johannes ruthirfurd' miles
Johannes Cullane
Andreas cullane
Thomas Chamer
Johannes colisone
patricius lesly
Alexander menyeis
thomas Waus
Alexander gray
Dauid Andirson'
Duncanus colisone
Thomas Wod
Robertus crag
Willelmus futhes
Dauid' steuart
Willelmus portar
Willelmus Wormet
georgeus bisset
Patricius Reid
Johannes andersone
Wilyeame murray
Alexander malison'
Dauid'

Eodem die georgeus Bisset Electus fuit magister operis et fabrice
ecclesie parrochialis dicti burgj pro Anno Instanti prestito solito Juramento
Insuper dictus georgeus electus fuit Bursator et Intromissor bonorum
communium dicti burgi pro Anno Instanti Quequid' bona communia disponet per
visum et mandatum gilbertj menyeis prepositi et gil Johannis cullane
super communi opere burgj tanquam decanj gilde excercenti huismodi officium Et
balliuj accusabunt foristallatores burgj et dictus prepositus Johannes et
georgeus component cum eisdem et pecuniam suorum amerciamentorum dictus
georgeus recipiat

The saide day It was Statut' and ordanit be the prouest balyeis and counsale that
nay fischearis within this burghe' sale fre Intromet nor resaue vthir mennis seruandis
within thar botis hous' or seruice vnto the tyme that thai haue speciale licence and
be fre of thar mastiris quhome with thai ar feit and duellis and quha that
falyeis herintile and brekis this statut and beis conuict' tharof sale pay xl s' in to Sanct
Nicholes werk and pay sale reman with thar mastir quhar thai ar'
Obefor

The said' day It was statut and ordanit be the prouost balyeis and counsale present
for the tyme that the four' sergeandis sale pas throwe the haile toune warne
commavnde and charge ale maner of personis havand myddingis befor thar yettis and hous'
one the mercat gat to ger' remoyve thame and clenge the gat vndir the pane of xl s'
vnforgevin to be appliit to Sanct nicholes werk within thre dais hereftir follouing and
gif the saide officiaris or ony ane of thame falyeis herintile salbe secludit and depreuit
of that office

The saide day the prouost balyeis and Counsale ratefeit affermit and appreuit ale statutis
maid' be thame the yer' bigane for the commone veale and gude of the toune

div.head: Appreciatores Carnium
div.p:
gilbertus litster Duncanus fiff alexander malisone Dauid fynne Willelmus blinsele
Willelmus cheishame Andreas meldrum Andreas litster and Dauid brois'
evin quartar Johannes mar' balliuus Normannus leslie sergeandus
gustatores seruicie Willelmus bonatmakar et Donaldus baxtar
futy quartar Andreas fif balliuus Willelmus scrimgeor sergeandus
gustatores seruicie Alexander stabillar' et Willelmus Duncane
Cruikit quartar Jacobus Colisone balliuus et andreas nachtj sergeandus
gustatores seruicie
grene quartar Walterus Cullane et gilbertus prestone sergeandus
gustatores seruicie

Jonhne leslie of Warderis
sere Jonhne ruthirfurde knicht
Jonhne of Cullane
Androw Cullane
Jonhne Colisone
Alexander gray
george bysset
William futhes
Robert crag

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem decimo die mensis
octobris anno quo supra

The saide day Jonhne mathesone Robert Wat Thome bryame thome towy
gelis monrow gilbert monrow Jonhne bicht Jonhne barkar Jonhne henry
patry mescroip and William patonsone quhit fischearis in futy grantit to pay sere
Duncan nachtj chaplan of Sanct clementis chapele his fe eftir the tenor of his
evident maid tharapone

The saide day ale the broustaris of this burghe' was conuict' be ane Suorne
assis' Jonhne cullan forspekar for the brekin of common ordinance in selling of aile
for viij d' that was set be the Cunnaris for vj d' quhilk was nocht provabile ayle Except'
Certane personis contenit in the officiaris bile Ande gif thai brek commone ordinance in
tyme to Cum and beis conuict' tharof the first tyme thai sale pay viii s' / the secunde tyme
thar ayle sal be disponit at the croice the third tyme thar ledis and caldronis' salbe
brocht to the mercat croice thar bodomes strikin out and thai salbe secludit the brevin
xj die octobris anno quo supra

The saide day Jonhne of balcromy grantit that he ande Williame Wellis youngar
was Souerte to Jonhne of Kennertj for ane barrele of girls' for gilbert Wellis

The saide day the prouest and balyeis chargit and ordanit Androw michelsone to deliuer
to Jonhne vschear' the ald' chartiris of the lande Set to him in feuferme the said'

The saide day Williame bremar lauchfullie warnit callit and nocht Comperit to ansuer
at the Instance of Jonhne of Cullane for the deferring of the making of his keis was
for the quhilk he was in Amerciament of the court et cetera Ande the balyeis ordanit to distrenye the
saide William for his absence and tharfor the saide Jonhne Solempnitlie protestit quhat skath
he happinnis to tak throw the wanting of his keis his durris an lokis being oppin
suld' be Recouerit be him one the said' William

The saide day Androw stratone Curat to Robert steuinsone offerit him to preiwe ane Ring
ane hors and quheile Cardis and certane vthir gudis of airschip contenit in the bile gevin
tharapone beand' in Androw Steuinsonis possessione the tyme of his deces' this day xxtj
dais and gif it be lauchfule falyeing tharof the next lauchfule day thareftir follouing
In presens of Norman leslie procurator to bessy leslie the Relict of the saide Androw

The saide day It was statut' and ordanit be the prouest balyeis ande Counsale that ale the
baxtaris of this burghe' sale baik xxxiiij vnce of quhet brede for ij d' nochtwitht
standand' the saide baxtaris bakande xxxij vnce of clene gude quhitflour
weile boutit and bakin for ij d' thai salbe ourlukit quhile thai be forthir auisit
Ande this statut to be obseruit and kepit vndir the pane of brekin of common ordi
nance

The saide day It was Statut and ordanit that ale the Candilmakaris of this toune sale
mak Candile ij for j d' and ane for ane penny smale wekit weile dryit the punde
weing for iij d' and sale Sele the punde for iij d' be wecht

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xiiij die mensis Octobris
anno quo Supra

The said' day Williame maltman grantit he was avand to Robert Waus
v firlotis and iii pecis of malt and allegit he hed pait It to gilbert Wellis in his
Nayme tharfor the balyeis chargit the said Williame to bring ane sufficient
acquitance fra the saide gilbert of the pament of the said malt this day
viii dais and falyeing tharof to pay the saide malt to the saide Robert

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvj die mensis
octobris anno quo supra

The saide day Jonhne Colisone fande ane borghe in the handis of Norman
leslie officiar' that the xvij s' beand in the handis of thomas straloche aucht
to Robert murray aucht to remane in the said thomas handis and to be arrestit
to his challance Ande in continent the saide officiar' at commavnde of the balyeis
arrestit the saide xvij s' in the handis of the said thomas nochtwithstandinge
the said thomas opinlie requerit the said Robert in Jugement to ger lous'
the saide arrest and offerit pament furthwith in Redy golde Ande the saide Robert
refusit and said he wald' finde nay Souerte and the balyeis chargit the said thomas to hald'
the saide money in his hand becaus' he wald' finde nay Souerte

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eisudem xix die octobris
anno quo supra

Eodem die Andreas Wricht conuictus fuit per assisam ex ore Johannis Cullan prelocutoris
eiusdem pro perturbio thome bridy et Idem thomas quitus de perturbio ipsius
Andree et cetera Infra diliberatum fuit per dictam assisam quod antequis eorum alterum
perturbauerit in pastrum et Inde conuictus fuerit persoluet vnam li' Cere ad
lumen Sancti sanguinis et x s' fabrice ecclesie

Eodem die Cuthbertus Jonhnestone deuenit plegius legalis quos thomas bridy
erit Indempnis pro andrea Wricht aliter quam per viam Juris Et Duncanus fif deuenit
plegius legalis quod dictus Andreas erit Indempnis pro prefato thoma aliter quam per viam
Juris et vtraque pars obligatur ad conseruandum suos plegios Indempnes de huismodi fi
deuissione

Curia Balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem vicesimoprimo
die mensis octobris Anno Dominj millesimo quingentesimo decimo

Inquisicio facta apud burgum de Abirdene vicesimoprimo die mensis octobris
anno Dominj millesimo quingentesimo decimo coram honorabilibus viris Jacobo colison'
Andrea fif et Waltero cullan' tribus balliuorum burgj de Aberdene in pretorio
eiusdem protribunali sedentibus per subscriptum videlicet Johannem ruthirfurd militem andream
cullan' Johannem colisone thomam Waus Johannem andersone Johannem arthour patricium
chernsid' patricium reid' andream stratone' Dauid fynne andream litster Duncanum
fif Andream lousone Karolin stevinsone et patricium arthour burgensis dictj burgj
Quj Jurati dicunt quod quondam Johannes Duncansone pater mariote Duncanson'
latricis presencium obiit vltimo vestitus et sasitus vt de feodo ad pacem et fidem
domini nostri Regis de quadam terra anteriore Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico
superiori ecclesie ex boreali parte eiusdem vicj inter terram Johannis moir ex orientali
ex vna et terram heredum quondam thome Rolland' ex occidentali partibus
ab altera communionem viam Regiam versus austrum et terram Interiorem dicti quondam
Johannis versus boream Et quod dicta mariota est legittima et propinquior heres
dictj quondam Johannis fatris suj de dicta terra cum pertinenciis Et quod est
legittime etatis Et quod dicta terra valet nunc per annum triginta solidos Et
valuit xxtj solidos tempore pacis Et quod tenetur in capite de supremo domino
nostro rege per seruicio burgagium Et nunc existit in manibus Dominj nostris Regis
per simplicem et puram resignacionem Katherine cullan' relicta quondam dictj
Johannis coniunctam infeodacionem huismodi terre habens per spacium Trium mensum
aut eocirca in defectu verj heredis Jus suum huisque minime prosequentis

Idem Jurati dicunt quod quondam Johannes Durward frater matris Johannis
Reoche latoris presencium obijt vltimo vestitus et sasitus vt de feodo ad pacem
et ifdem domini nostri Regis de quadam terra anteriore Jacente infra dictum burgum
in vico inferiori dictj burgj ex australi parte eiusdem inter terram Duncanj
gilrutht ex occidentali ex vna et terram Johannis malisone ex orientali
partibus ab altera terram Interiorem ipsius quondam Johnanis versus austrum
et communionem viam regiam vesus boream Et quod dictus Johannes reoche
est legittimis et propinquior heres eiusdem quondam Johanis Durward'
frater matris suj de dicta terra anteriore cum pertinenciis Et quod est legittime
etatis Et quod dicta terra valen nunc per annum trisdecim solidos et quatuor
denarios Et valuit decim solidos tempore pacis Et quod tenetur in capite de
supremo domini nostro Rege per seruicium burgagium Et nunc existit In
manibus domini nostri Regis Katherine cullane relicte quondam dicti Johannis Dur
ward' Racione communite infeodacionis pro toto tempore vice sue datis et
clausis

Idem Jurati dicunt quod quondam Willelmus Durward' filius Auunculi Johannis
reoche latoris presencium obijt vltimo vestitus et sasitus vt de feodo ad pacem
domini nostri Regis de vna quadam terra Interiore Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico
Inferiore ecclesie dictj burgj inter terram Duncanj gilrutht versus occidens
et terram Johannis malisone versus oriens terram anteriorem quondam Johannis
Durward' patris ipsius Wilellmi versus boream excedens in longitudine
ac terra versus austrum Et de vna terra
Jacente in vico viridj inter terram quondam Johannis litster ex orientali ex vna
et terram heredum quondam domini Johannis strathachin ex occidentali
partibus ab altera et communionem viam regiam versus boream Et quod dictus
Johannes est legittimmis et propinquior heres dictj quondam Willelmi filius
auunculj suj de dictis terris cum pertinenciis Et quod est legittime etatis
Et quod dicte terra valent nunc per annum vigintj sex solidos et octo denarios
Et valuerunt vigintj solidos tempore pacis Et quod tenentur in capite de
supremo domino nostro Rege per seruicium burgagium Et nunc extistunt In manibus
Katherine cullan' matris ipsius quondam Willelmj coniunctam infeodacionem huismodi
terrarum habens pro toto tempore vice sue datis et clausis

The saide Williame forbes of towiis oblist him be the fatht of his bodie to the prouest
and balyeis that gif thai happinnis ony ayr or ayris ane or may Cum and clame the
landis of heretage of vmquhile Jonhne Durvarde and William Durvarde his sone
havande mair' Richt tharto thane Jonhne Reoche that the saide ayr or ayris sale
haue fre entires to the said' landis but ony Impediment nochtwithstanding the seruing
of the saide Johnez' brevis tharof

The saide day alexander ruthirfurde and Jonhne menyeis was quyt be ane Suorne
Jonhne Cullane forspekar of the brekin of the flessaris Skentles

Curia Balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vicesimoquinto die
mensis octobris Anno quingentesimo

The said day the bailyeis chargit alexander King to content and pay to Androw louson'
ane franche crovne within terme of law and' chargit Walter cullan bailye and patry
chernsid' to freitht and releif the said alexander of the sovme contenit in the obligacioun'
maid tharapone And' als' ordanit the laif of the merchandis' apone the quhilkis
the said Walter cullan is complanteis to be chargit witht ane officiar to pay thar
partis of the said money

The said day the borgh' fundin be Wilyeam andirsone flessar one Johnne andirsone
alias lochhillis' for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him of ane franche crovne of wecht
or the auaile of It was fundin of awaile be ane suorne assis' ser Johne
ruthirfurd' forspekar for the quhilkis the said Johnne Andersone was in amerciament
of the court and' aucht to pay the said crovn' of wecht to the said Wilyam
or thane xviij s'

The said day Wilyeame Wellis grantit that he come Souerte to Johnne Kennerty
for half ane barrell of girsillis quhilkis the bailyeis chargit him
to pay within terme of law and' atour the said Wilyeam fand' Johnne abirdour
souerte to pay the said girsillis to the said Johnne Kennerty

The said day robert murray lauchfully' callit warnit and nocht comperit
be androw nachty officiar til haue ansuerit at the Instance of Johnne
collison' bailye was in amerciament of the court in defalt of apperance

head.add: Ratificacio fact' pro equitan' in die Sancti nicholaij

div.p:
The saide day the prouost balyeis and Counsale ale in ane consent
ratifeit affirmit and appreuit the Act' and louabile statut maile obefor
Anent the personis diuisit and ordanit to Rid' one Sanct nicholes
day with the abbat and prior of bonacorde throw the toune as vys'
and wount has bene tymes bigan and ale pontis contenit in the samyn

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem octauo
die mensis Nouembris Anno Dominj et cetera quingentesimo decimo

The said day ormond lesly officiar grantit him awand' to thomas meldrum
xiiij s' quhilkis the bailyeis chargit him to pay within terme of lawe And' anent
the ij s' clamit be the said thomas gif the said ormond' bringis nocht the man that aw
the samyn' he sal pay the said' tua schillingis the said' day

The said Androu naughtie officiar grantit that he had no command of na
bailye to pas' with master thomas chamer curat to pund the land' pertening to Johnne
arthour abuf the port and' atour James colisone Androw fif and Walter cullane
bailyeis grantit that thai gef na command to the said Androu to pas' with the said
mastir thomas to pund' the said land'

The said day Androu baxter grantit that he had ane Jak and ane cot
of mailye pertenyng to Johnne mvnk quhilkis the Bailyeis chargit him
to deliuer within terme of lawe

The said day James colisone Bailye grantit that master thomas chamer
curat come to him one the gild' court day last bipast and requirit at
him to gif command and direct' ane officiar with him to pay pund' for his annuell'
And the said bailye grantit that he commandit androw naughtie to pas' with him
in generale to pund' for annuellis and nocht in speciale

The said day Johnne arthour allegeit that he vnderstud' nocht gif master
thomas chamer had ony annuell of his land vteutht the port of the gallou
gat nocht withstanding gif the said master thomas wald' schaw gif he
ony annuell of the said land' he offerit him reddy thar and in tyme
to cum to mak pament of the said annuell he schawand' that he had the samyn

The said day the bailyeis continewit the opnyng of the deposicionis
of the witnes anent ane part of airschip clamit be robert stevinsone
to this day viij dais And' ordand the officiaris to warne the Relict'
of the said Androue to heir the said deposicionis oppinnit

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
die mensis Nouembris anno quingentesimo decimo

The said day Johnne Crag grantit that charlis stevinsone
had na part of the gudes contenit in the obligacioun' maid to mathou
Doublet induellar in Deip be the said Johnne Dauid' Rutherfurd
and the said charlis Nocht withstanding the said Johnne said that the said charlis
chesit ane puncioun' of wyne to Alexander nory
